summary: A CBBE conversion of Ursine Armor Pack UNP by nsk13. TBBP and BodySlideable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=2]This is a simple conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?]Ursine Armor Pack UNP [/url]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url].
All three armours - Barbarian, Imperial & Stormcloak and all their varients - are converted for use with CBBE Bodies.[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-2-1422090182.png[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
[size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Requirements [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][/size]

-[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?] Ursine Armor Pack UNP[/url][/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2].[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2] Must be installed first. Override with my mod.
[font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2]- HDT heel[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2] version requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url].[/size][/font][/font]
- Caliente's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] body meshes.[/size][/font][font=Tahoma]

[size=5][/size][/font][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Acquisition [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][font=Tahoma]

Crafting manuals for each armor can be found in-game and need to be held [b]in the inventory[/b] at the time of crafting for the recipes to appear.
[font=Tahoma]All armors are craftable at the forge under the Scaled category.[/font]

[font=Tahoma]Stormcloak Manual: Windhelm, Palace of the Kings.[/font]
Barbarian Manual: Winterhold, Birna's Oddments.
Imperial Manual: Solitude, Castle Dour.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-4-1422090183.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-1-1422090182.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-3-1422090183.png[/img]
[/font][font=Tahoma]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
[size=5][/size][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Credits [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font]

[font=Tahoma]Original UNP mod and all texture work belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url].[/font]

[font=Tahoma][size=2]Cuisse Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies[/url] by Petrovich.
[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2]Armor Meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] by Tiwa44.
Half Bra Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation[/url] by brokefoot.
Armlets/Cloak Meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male[/url] by SydneyB.
Collar Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3[/url] by NPR.
Underwear Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/?]Osare Underwear - UNP[/url] by anano.[/size][/font]

[font=Tahoma]Huge thanks to the entire team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - without which this conversion would not have been possible.[/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
This mod is a Nexus exclusive! Please do not upload it anywhere else.
[/font][/center]
author: Mitosuke

files.changelogHtml: Fixed all gauntlets. Fingers no longer appear extended or clip through palms when unarmed or wonky when using magics.

files.name: Ursine Armor Pack - CBBE - non-HDT
files.changelogHtml: Fixed all gauntlets. Fingers no longer appear extended or clip through palms when unarmed or wonky when using magics.
